data.text: Sometime a few days after the [Japan Derby] had finished-
data.processed: <story>Sometime a few days after the [Japan Derby] had finished-

data.text: Spe, Training's over you know.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Spe, Training's over you know.

data.text: Spe, Training's over you know.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Spe, Training's over you know.

data.text: Fue…?! Uwaaa, so it's already over?!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Fue…?! Uwaaa, so it's already over?!

data.text:
Lately, Special Week's concentration is broken pretty easily. 
The cause seems to be what her gaze has fallen on just now-
data.processed:
<story>Lately, Special Week's concentration is broken pretty easily. 
<story>The cause seems to be what her gaze has fallen on just now-

data.text: Haa… Haa… just one more lap!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Haa… Haa… just one more lap!

data.text: As I thought, you're worried about Silence Suzuka, aren't you?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>As I thought, you're worried about Silence Suzuka, aren't you?

data.text: As I thought, you're worried about Silence Suzuka, aren't you?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>As I thought, you're worried about Silence Suzuka, aren't you?

data.text:
Yes, when Suzuka-san is focusing on races and doing her best, 
I think she's awesome… But lately…
data.name: Special Week

choices.text: Looks like she's worried about something…

data.processed:
<story>Yes, when Suzuka-san is focusing on races and doing her best, 
<story>I think she's awesome… But lately…

data.text: Eh…? You think so too, Trainer-san…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Eh…? You think so too, Trainer-san…?

data.text:
Lately when I watch her races, for some reason 
she looks like she's kind of uncomfortable. It 
doesn't look like she's enjoying it.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Lately when I watch her races, for some reason 
<story>she looks like she's kind of uncomfortable. It 
<story>doesn't look like she's enjoying it.

data.text:
Lately when I watch her races, for some reason 
she looks like she's kind of uncomfortable. It 
doesn't look like she's enjoying it.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Lately when I watch her races, for some reason 
<story>she looks like she's kind of uncomfortable. It 
<story>doesn't look like she's enjoying it.

data.text:
…Um! Can I stay here a bit longer? 
I want to accompany Suzuka-san while she's training!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>…Um! Can I stay here a bit longer? 
<story>I want to accompany Suzuka-san while she's training!

data.text:
Meddling in the affairs of another team's Uma Musume 
is probably none of my business. But even I have times 
where I honestly can't just sit idly by-
data.processed:
<story>Meddling in the affairs of another team's Uma Musume 
<story>is probably none of my business. But even I have times 
<story>where I honestly can't just sit idly by-

data.text:
Meddling in the affairs of another team's Uma Musume 
is probably none of my business. But even I have times 
where I honestly can't just sit idly by-
data.processed:
<story>Meddling in the affairs of another team's Uma Musume 
<story>is probably none of my business. But even I have times 
<story>where I honestly can't just sit idly by-

data.text: In that case, I'll go with you. Let's go talk to her.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>In that case, I'll go with you. Let's go talk to her.

data.text: In that case, I'll go with you. Let's go talk to her.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>In that case, I'll go with you. Let's go talk to her.

data.text:
Fuuu~! 
Thank you very much for the pace training!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Fuuu~! 
<story>Thank you very much for the pace training!

data.text: Sorry for suddenly having you join us.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Sorry for suddenly having you join us.

data.text: No, it was worthwhile for me too.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>No, it was worthwhile for me too.

data.text:
Unfortunately, I'm on a different team than Suzuka-san, but if 
we stay behind like this we can still train together… ehehe!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Unfortunately, I'm on a different team than Suzuka-san, but if 
<story>we stay behind like this we can still train together… ehehe!

data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
Um, Suzuka-san… Do you remember when we first met? 
How, without thinking, I suddenly called out to you.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Um, Suzuka-san… Do you remember when we first met? 
<story>How, without thinking, I suddenly called out to you.

data.text:
At that time, after coming here alone from Hokkaido I wondered if 
things would go well. I was really worried.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>At that time, after coming here alone from Hokkaido I wondered if 
<story>things would go well. I was really worried.

data.text:
But when I saw Suzuka-san running with such joy, all those 
worries were blown away! I began to think my time at the academy 
would definitely be fun!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>But when I saw Suzuka-san running with such joy, all those 
<story>worries were blown away! I began to think my time at the academy 
<story>would definitely be fun!

data.text: But the Suzuka-san here now seems different from before…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>But the Suzuka-san here now seems different from before…

data.text:
During your Debut, you were definitely like that. Running to the 
goal from out in front, you looked like you were having fun.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>During your Debut, you were definitely like that. Running to the 
<story>goal from out in front, you looked like you were having fun.

data.text:
During your Debut, you were definitely like that. Running to the 
goal from out in front, you looked like you were having fun.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>During your Debut, you were definitely like that. Running to the 
<story>goal from out in front, you looked like you were having fun.

data.text:
…I don't really know, now. 
There's no doubt I'm chasing my dreams with all my might.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>…I don't really know, now. 
<story>There's no doubt I'm chasing my dreams with all my might.

data.text:
Even then, no matter how much I chase and chase, my dream keeps 
feeling like it's getting farther and farther away…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Even then, no matter how much I chase and chase, my dream keeps 
<story>feeling like it's getting farther and farther away…

data.text:
Ever since I was small, I've loved running. The only things I 
would hear were my footsteps, and the wind whipping by.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Ever since I was small, I've loved running. The only things I 
<story>would hear were my footsteps, and the wind whipping by.

data.text:
I couldn't forget your words at that 
time, even now I'm pursuing them…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>I couldn't forget your words at that 
<story>time, even now I'm pursuing them…

data.text:
Special Week-san, you said I looked like I was having fun 
running… but it's actually the opposite.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Special Week-san, you said I looked like I was having fun 
<story>running… but it's actually the opposite.

data.text:
Special Week-san is always straight-forwardly chasing her dream, 
so pure, and radiant… but, I…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Special Week-san is always straight-forwardly chasing her dream, 
<story>so pure, and radiant… but, I…

data.text:
In the course of piling up your efforts, falling 
in to a stoic state is a common occurence.
data.processed:
<story>In the course of piling up your efforts, falling 
<story>in to a stoic state is a common occurence.

data.text:
But that's just evidence of how earnest she is. If her feelings 
are that strong, then there has to be plenty of other ways-

choices.text: Wouldn't it be fine to just run as you desire?
choices.processed: <size=37>Wouldn't it be fine to just run as you desire?</size>

choices.text: Wouldn't it be fine to just run as you desire?
choices.processed: <size=37>Wouldn't it be fine to just run as you desire?</size>

data.processed:
<story>But that's just evidence of how earnest she is. If her feelings 
<story>are that strong, then there has to be plenty of other ways-

data.text: As I… desire?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>As I… desire?

data.text:
Saying something like this is probably unfitting 
for a trainer but, forget about winning and all that 
other hard stuff for once. And just run.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Saying something like this is probably unfitting 
<story>for a trainer but, forget about winning and all that 
<story>other hard stuff for once. And just run.

data.text:
Saying something like this is probably unfitting 
for a trainer but, forget about winning and all that 
other hard stuff for once. And just run.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Saying something like this is probably unfitting 
<story>for a trainer but, forget about winning and all that 
<story>other hard stuff for once. And just run.

data.text:
Don't think about pacing. If you get worn out midway, 
don't worry about it. Anyways, just run the way 
you want, try running as you desire.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Don't think about pacing. If you get worn out midway, 
<story>don't worry about it. Anyways, just run the way 
<story>you want, try running as you desire.

data.text: Run the way I want… the way I desire…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Run the way I want… the way I desire…

data.text:
Suzuka-san! Let's run one more lap! Let's forget all that 
complicated stuff and just run like 'whooooosh'!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka-san! Let's run one more lap! Let's forget all that 
<story>complicated stuff and just run like 'whooooosh'!

data.text: …Understood. I'll give it a try.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Understood. I'll give it a try.

data.text:
(The wind feels nice, the sound of my own horseshoes is 
soothing… there's no unnecessary noise, and there's no 
obstructions in my way)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>(The wind feels nice, the sound of my own horseshoes is 
<story>soothing… there's no unnecessary noise, and there's no 
<story>obstructions in my way)

data.text: (I'm just running but, when compared to a race, this is…)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>(I'm just running but, when compared to a race, this is…)

data.text: (Much more beautiful "scenery"-)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>(Much more beautiful "scenery"-)

data.text: Hyaaaa~!? Suzuka-san, you're so fast!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Hyaaaa~!? Suzuka-san, you're so fast!

data.text: More, of this "scenery"…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>More, of this "scenery"…!

data.text: Ueeeehhh~?! You're accelerating again?!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ueeeehhh~?! You're accelerating again?!

data.text:
Good work, you two. 
Running as you desired, how was it?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Good work, you two. 
<story>Running as you desired, how was it?

data.text:
L-Look at us… we're both… 
so… worn-out…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>L-Look at us… we're both… 
<story>so… worn-out…

data.text: …it's true that we're both worn-out… but…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…it's true that we're both worn-out… but…

data.text:
…I felt like I saw it, the thing I've been chasing this whole 
time. The "scenery" I've always wanted to see.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>…I felt like I saw it, the thing I've been chasing this whole 
<story>time. The "scenery" I've always wanted to see.

data.text: Looks like you really do love running, don't you?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Looks like you really do love running, don't you?

data.text: Looks like you really do love running, don't you?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Looks like you really do love running, don't you?

data.text: Eh…?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Eh…?

data.text:
When you were frantically running, you saw 
the thing you were chasing, right?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>When you were frantically running, you saw 
<story>the thing you were chasing, right?

data.text:
When you were frantically running, you saw 
the thing you were chasing, right?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>When you were frantically running, you saw 
<story>the thing you were chasing, right?

data.text:
Just racing to win won't lead you to your dream. Racing for the 
sake of having fun running will definitely lead you there.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Just racing to win won't lead you to your dream. Racing for the 
<story>sake of having fun running will definitely lead you there.

data.text:
Just racing to win won't lead you to your dream. Racing for the

data.processed:
<story>Just racing to win won't lead you to your dream. Racing for the

data.text: Having fun while running, will lead to my dream…
data.name: Silence Suzuka

choices.text: Run to your hearts content, Suzuka!
Run to your hearts content, Suzuka!

data.processed: <story>Having fun while running, will lead to my dream…

data.text: Fufuu… okay!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Fufuu… okay!

data.text: A few days after that-
data.processed: <story>A few days after that-

data.text:
Allllright! Let's do our best aiming to be "Japan's #1 Uma 
Musume" again today, Spe! First off, let's head to the bamboo 
grove and hunt for bamboo shoots!
